Name: AmigaOS classic
Creator: Commodore International, Haage & Partner, Hyperion Entertainment

column10: Proprietary, open source clone available under AROS Public License

Preferred license[g 1]: 4.0 for classic and 4.1 available as standalone package at €29

Name: eComStation

Name: GNU/Linux

Name: iOS

Name: macOS

column10: open source core system (Intel-PowerPC versions): APSL, GNU GPL, others

Creator: Apple Inc.
Preferred license[g 1]: No longer a separate operating system, but a group of services installed atop any current version of Mac OS X
